item.title: About
item.description: Who am I? And why did i create a blog?.And why should you read what I write here? And what is Nobelium ApS? Let’s take one at a time. My name is Steffen, and I live in Gren√• on Djursland (In Denmark). Together with my wife and daughter. I’ve made this blog to have a place to write down my thoughts. I’m very reserved towards modern social media, but very open to technology.
